title: The Gilded House of Bloxam
description: When her husband abandons her in the fey realm to pursue his own ambitions, Kat is left broken and terrified.Determined to never fall in love again, Kat does her best to heal and find purpose in the strange new world of Satisterre.When wings are proffered too her, however, it threatens to disrupt her newfound tranquility and completely throw Kat’s world out of balance.Will Kat be able to overcome her own reservations about love and accept the rare gift she’s been given?Or will her fragile heart keep her from her one true chance at real happiness?
author: Amber Gatlin
